properties.Identified_in_Last_Two_Planning: Used in Two Consecutive Prior Housing Elements - Vacant
properties.Zoning_Designation_Current_Desc: The purpose of the PMU planned mixed use district is to implement the policies of the Dixon General Plan, which encourages the adaptive reuse of older residential structures near the downtown to office and retail commercial uses. The PMU districts also encourage new construction which is compatible in size and architectural style with the downtown and the abutting residential neighborhoods
